name: Course Materials
description: Documents and resources used for teaching and facilitating courses, including syllabi, lecture notes, and assignments.

name: Assessment Materials
description: Tools and documents used to evaluate and grade student performance, such as exams, quizzes, and grading rubrics.

name: Research Materials
description: Documents related to faculty research activities, including proposals, data sets, and published papers.

name: Administrative Documents
description: Papers and records necessary for departmental administration, including meeting minutes, annual reports, and budget reports.

name: Professional Development
description: Materials and records related to faculty professional growth and skill enhancement, including workshop materials and certificates.

name: Service and Outreach
description: Documents pertaining to faculty involvement in community service and outreach activities, such as community engagement plans and partnership agreements.

name: Faculty Evaluation and Development
description: Records and materials related to the evaluation and development of faculty performance, including self-evaluation reports and teaching portfolios.

name: Student Supervision
description: Documents and logs related to the supervision of student research and academic progress, such as thesis proposals and progress reports.

name: Miscellaneous
description: Various other documents that do not fit into the above categories, including correspondence, newsletters, and policy documents.
